issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw:
You need to enter your BIOS and confirm you have four cores and not two.  
If you have four cores go to the menu and find the settings for the  performance of the system.
Disable the " hyper threading" save and exit .
Another member of my team has a laptop with an Intel Core i5-6200U CPU x4 it only has two cores.
We have a new laptop with Intel® Core™ i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz × 4 
Val still wouldn't stand until we disabled the hyper threading.
Hope this helps, good luck.
content.html:
You need to enter your BIOS and confirm you have four cores and not two.
If you have four cores go to the menu and find the settings for the performance of the system. Disable the " hyper threading" save and exit . Another member of my team has a laptop with an Intel Core i5-6200U CPU x4 it only has two cores. We have a new laptop with Intel® Core™ i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz × 4 Val still wouldn't stand until we disabled the hyper threading. Hope this helps, good luck.
